data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 991,500 souls in Surat Thani and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Surat Thani, Thailand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Surat Thani who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Surat Thani, Thailand.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Surat Thani to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Moken, Salon people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Surat Thani words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Surat Thani, Thailand to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Surat Thani.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

location.name: Surat Thani
location.cities_list: Surat Thani, Ko Samui, Tha Kham, Ban Na San, Don Sak
location.cities_list_w_pop: Surat Thani (127,201), Ko Samui (50,000), Tha Kham (25,810), Ban Na San (21,900), Don Sak (12,422)
